statements: UPDATE clickbait_articles SET clickbait_flag = true, article_title = '10 Ways to Lose Weight Fast' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE clickbait_articles SET article_title = 'Breaking News: Alien Invasion Imminent!', clickbait_flag = false WHERE article_id = 2;
UPDATE clickbait_articles SET article_title = 'New Clickbait Title' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE clickbait_articles SET clickbait_flag = FALSE, article_title = 'Updated Article Title' WHERE article_id = 2;
UPDATE Article SET title = 'New Title' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE Review SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', review_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE review_id = 4;
UPDATE Article SET clickbait_flag = TRUE, title = 'New Title' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE Review SET review_date = '2022-12-31', reviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE review_id = 5;
UPDATE articles SET is_clickbait = TRUE WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE flagged_articles SET is_reviewed = FALSE WHERE flag_id = 3;
UPDATE articles SET title = 'Updated Title', is_clickbait = false WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE clickbait_keywords SET keyword = 'Updated Keyword' WHERE keyword_id = 2;
UPDATE ClickbaitArticles SET article_title = '10 Tips for Catchy Headlines' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE ReviewTasks SET task_status = 'Completed' WHERE task_id = 5;
UPDATE ClickbaitArticles SET is_clickbait = TRUE WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE ReviewTasks SET task_status = 'Reviewed' WHERE reviewer_id = 2 AND article_id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET title='New Title', is_clickbait=true WHERE article_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE articles SET content = 'New and Improved Content' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET is_clickbait_detected = TRUE, review_comment = 'Possible clickbait content' WHERE review_id = 2;
